content: **crocheted jumper in drops belle the piece is worked bottom up with lace pattern and wide sewn-in sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-106 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 01 white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge ** 20 stitches in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
